Package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor.interfaces

Interfaces and data for sensor services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor.interfaces provides two interfaces for sensor services, a data offered interface SensorDataOfferedI for the sensor service providers and SensorDataRequiredI for the sensor service clients.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SensorDataOfferedI
    The component interface SensorDataOfferedI defines a sensor provider service as a data exchanging API.
    SensorDataOfferedI.SensorDataI
    The interface SensorDataI defines the basic behaviour of sensor data exchanged through this component interface.
    SensorDataRequiredI
    The component interface SensorDataRequiredI defines a sensor client service as a data exchanging API.
    SensorDataRequiredI.SensorDataI
    The Java interface SensorDataIdefines the basic behaviour of sensor data exchanged through this component interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SensorData
    The class SensorData implements the data that can be exchanged through SensorDataOfferedI and SensorDataRequiredI interfaces.

Package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor.interfaces Description

Interfaces and data for sensor services

The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor.interfaces provides two interfaces for sensor services, a data offered interface SensorDataOfferedI for the sensor service providers and SensorDataRequiredI for the sensor service clients. The two interfaces define an interface that must be implemented by a data carrying object. The class SensorData provide an implementation of both interfaces for sensor data that are simply (double) real numbers.
